1.title: Dream Questline
1.plot: Codex starts her dream job, but it starts off with her new boss making the employees mad at her.

2.title: New Party Members
2.plot: Codex discovers Floyd is running scared. Blaydzz desperately tries to remain relevant online. Vork's new love life inconveniences Zaboo.

3.title: Makeshift Solutions
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Raid Timez
4.plot: Codex's world is turned upside down when the Guild visits her at work.

5.title: Strange Frenemies
5.plot: Zaboo injects himself into the office and Codex learns more of Floyd's quirks.

6.title: Into the Breach
6.plot: Vork airs grievances to Floyd. Zaboo and Tink explore the game expansion.

7.title: Occupy HQ
7.plot: Vork takes his protest to the Game HQ. Tink finds commonality with Donovan.

8.title: Dialogue Options
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: The Case of the Game Leak
9.plot: The game expansion is leaked over the internet. Clara deals with Mr. Wiggly's meltdown. Vork's protest continues.

10.title: Tipping Points
10.plot: Vork's protest intensifies as Floyd delays the expansion release.

11.title: Raid HQ!
11.plot: Codex steps up to face the protesters. Madeline and Vork reunite. The protesters and game team meet.

12.title: End Game
12.plot: Codex steps up to face the protesters. Vork and Madeline reunite. The game team meets the protesters and there is resolution.

1.title: Wake Up Call
1.plot: Cyd Sherman's online gaming addiction brings more than she bargains for...

2.title: Zaboo'd
2.plot: Cyd Sherman's imaginary world becomes all too real when a gnome warlock shows up on her doorstep.

3.title: The Macro Problem
3.plot: Codex's problem with Zaboo gets sidetracked by a crisis in The Guild.

4.title: Cheesybeards
4.plot: The Knights of Good finally meet face to face and...it's awkward.

5.title: Rather Be Raiding
5.plot: Codex tries to keep the Guild meeting on track and everything goes great! Not.

6.title: Total Wipe
6.plot: Codex confides in Zaboo before insisting he leaves her alone. Clara's nanny quits and both Tink and Vork are up for the job. Zaboo's mother turns up and is not happy to hear that her son is in love with Codex.

7.title: Home Invasion
7.plot: Zaboo's mother finally convinces him to move out out Codex's house, Tink 'looks after' Clara's kids and Bladezz posts a video of the animated characters of the guild having sex with each other.

8.title: Tipping Point
8.plot: Codex saves Zaboo's life and Bladezz is on the verge of ruining the game for everyone. Zaboo knows how to get Bladezz back but will only surrender the information if Codex agrees to help him get away from his over-bearing mother.

9.title: Owning Bladezz
9.plot: The Guild confronts Bladezz and Codex holds the trump card.

10.title: Boss Fight
10.plot: The Knights of Good must face their toughest enemy...Zaboo's Mom.

11.title: Game on
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Link the Loot
1.plot: A group of online gamers interact online and in real life.

2.title: Block'd
2.plot: Clara blows up in-game and out; Codex lays down the law to Zaboo.

3.title: Quest Accepted!
3.plot: Zaboo begins his journey on the road to manhood; Codex learns more about Vork than she's ever want to know.

4.title: Heroic Encounter
4.plot: Codex meets her new neighbor; The guys and girls of The Guild dish in separate channels.

5.title: Sacking Up
5.plot: Zaboo continues his quest to become a man; Tink tries to "help" Codex.

6.title: Blow Out!
6.plot: The girls give Codex advice; Friction between Vork and Zaboo escalates.

7.title: Panic Attack
7.plot: Codex deals with yet another Guildie on her doorstep.

8.title: Emergency!
8.plot: Vork calls a Guild meeting to deal with the server downtime.

9.title: Grouping Up
9.plot: The Guild splits up into guys and girls night while the game server goes down.

10.title: Socializing Sucks
10.plot: Bladezz takes control of Guy's night; Codex's neighbor shows up at her party.

11.title: Collision Course
11.plot: The guys crash girl's night; Zaboo gets a rude awakening.

1.title: Expansion Time
1.plot: The Guild waits in line for their game's expansion to come out, and deals with inter-personal tension in...dysfunctional ways.

2.title: Anarchy!
2.plot: A group of rival gamers cut in front of The Guild at the game store. And they aren't nice about it.

3.title: Player Down
3.plot: The Guild tries to cope with one man down. Or maybe two.

4.title: Get It Back!
4.plot: Codex enters enemy territory to get her Guildie back.

5.title: Application'd
5.plot: The Guild struggles to fill Tink's spot.

7.title: Coping and Stuff
7.plot: The Axis of Anarchy thwarts Codex's attempt to counter their attacks with logic and reasonableness.

8.title: +10 to Bravery
8.plot: Codex takes desperate measures to save the Guild. She even goes outside.

9.title: Wit's End
9.plot: The Guild crumbles under the Axis of Anarchy's attacks.

10.title: The Return!
10.plot: Like a Phoenix rising from the ashes, Vork returns to rebuild the Guild. Not really that dramatic, but you get the idea.

11.title: Battle Royale
11.plot: The Axis of Anarchy and The Knights of Good face off.

12.title: Hero
12.plot: It's up to Codex to save The Guild all by her lonesome. Solo. No pressure, really.

1.title: Epic Guilt
1.plot: Codex confesses her indiscretion with Fawkes to her guild-mates.

2.title: Strange Allies
2.plot: Bladezz helps Codex with her computer while the rest of the guild argue about what kind of guild hall to make.

3.title: Supportiv'd
3.plot: Vork declared that whomever raises the most money towards the guild hall gets to decide what it looks like. Zaboo decides to try being Codex's friend

4.title: Moving On
4.plot: Codex comes to terms with what happened between her and Fawkes and gets a "cheesy" job.

5.title: Loot Envy
5.plot: Bladezz is envious of Codex's new job. Tink and Clara team up.

6.title: Weird Respawn
6.plot: Zaboo's mother returns; Codex and Bladezz clash at Cheesy Beard's.

7.title: Awkward Birthday
7.plot: Codex is shocked when an unexpected guest shows up to Zaboo's mom's birthday dinner. Clara and Tink figure out how they'll make real money.

8.title: Busted
8.plot: Zaboo's mom advises Vork on how to make major in-game money. The rest of the guild finds out the truth about Codex's relationship with Fawkes.

9.title: Pirate Paddy
9.plot: Codex makes an Internet commercial for Cheesy Beard's starring Bladezz. Bladezz edits.

10.title: Festival of the Sea
10.plot: The Guild joins forces to help Codex with her job. Fawkes gets a taste of his own medicine...by Jeanette. And Vork gets more than he bargained for when he foolishly attempts to get rid of Zaboo's mom.

11.title: Hostile Takeovers
11.plot: Vork refuses to back out of his proposal; the rest of the guild prepare.

1.title: Road Trip!
1.plot: The Guildies head to the gaming convention but find the road a bit...bumpy.

2.title: Crash Pad
2.plot: Six people sharing one hotel room does not a happy Guild make.

3.title: Megagame-o-ramacon!
3.plot: The Guild members hit the floor of the gaming convention full-force.

4.title: Ends and Begins
4.plot: Blaadez, dressed as the Pirate Paddy Guy, opens up a "booth" where fans can pose with him; he later gains groupies in the form of Rachel, the first convention staff member the guild had met, and her friends, much to Vork's disapproval. Tink and Clara continue searching for someone who would let them borrow his or her booth so they can legally sell their t-shirts; one of the booths they come across is steampunk-themed, which Clara becomes overly-fascinated by. Codex decides to confess her new attraction for Zaboo, which does not turn out as she had hoped. Meanwhile, ...

5.title: Focus Problems
5.plot: Codex's neurosis is rejected by the Guild as close quarters lead to hot tempers.

6.title: Revolving Doors
6.plot: Vork manages Bladezz's career as Codex sets out on her own to solve the problems with their game

7.title: Downturn
7.plot: The Seat-Saver's network created by Zaboo gets serious as a famous writer seeks convention help, while Vork and Bladezz meet sci-fi celebrities in the autograph area.

8.title: Social Traumas
8.plot: Zaboo's "Seat Savers" reach breaking point as his Master Chief henchmen confront a big star. Codex encounters Tink's secret origins while Bladezz and Vork hobnob with "the fancies" at an exclusive celebrity party.

9.title: Invite Accepted
9.plot: Zaboo pays back Clara's favor as Tink and Codex set out on a mission together.

10.title: Strategy Timez
10.plot: The crowded hotel room hosts a war summit as the Guild regroups to head off the breakup of their game.

11.title: Costume Contest
11.plot: The Guild, semi-somewhat incognito, infiltrate the convention costume contest to stop their game from being ruined.

12.title: Grande Finale
12.plot: Codex tries to save the day while having to avoid cosplay carnage and hired muscle.

-1.title: Halloween!
-1.plot: The Guildies go trick or treating dressed as their avatars.

imdb.plot outline: The show revolves around the lives of online guild, The Knights of Good, who play countless hours of an unnamed MMORPG video game. The story focuses on Codex, the guild's Priestess, who attempts to lead a normal life after one of her guild-mates, Warlock Zaboo, shows up on her doorstep.
imdb.title: The Guild
plot: The show revolves around the lives of online guild, The Knights of Good, who play countless hours of an unnamed MMORPG video game. The story focuses on Codex, the guild's Priestess, who attempts to lead a normal life after one of her guild-mates, Warlock Zaboo, shows up on her doorstep.::Anonymous
